AuthorizationFormText.name: AuthorizationFormText
AuthorizationFormText.description: Represents an authorization form’s text and language settings.

AuthorizationFormId.description: Required. The ID of the associated authorization form record.

ContentDocumentId.description: The ID of the ContentDocument that provides the authorization form’s text.

DetailAuthorizationFormText.description: A detailed version of the authorization form.

FullAuthorizationFormUrl.description: The URL where the full text of the authorization form is located.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Locale.description: Create, Filter, Group, Nillable, Restricted picklist, Sort, Update

LocaleSelection.description: The combined language and locale ISO code that control the language of the authorization form text. Locale and LocaleSelection have the same function.

Name.description: Required. The name of the authorization form text.

SummaryAuthFormText.description: A shortened version of the authorization form that is displayed to the user.
